quote: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.  – Henry Ford
fact: A word or sentence that is the same front and back (racecar, kayak) is called a “palindrome”.
joke: Did you hear about the scientist who was lab partners with a pot of boiling water? He had a very esteemed colleague.
